ryan.project2.ece558.project2

Class QuizManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ryan.project2.ece558.project2.QuizManager

  • public class QuizManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The QuizManager class handles the parsing of the JSON quiz file into JSON objects and then extracting the quiz question information and converting them into an array of quiz questions. It also handles the logic of managing what question to ask and checking if the answer was correct or not.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QuizManager(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String quizName, int questionNum)
      Constructor for the Quiz Manager Sets the context from the calling activity, the quiz to access, and current question number
      QuizManager(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String quizName, int questionNum, int correctCount, int cheatCount)
      Constructor for the Quiz Manager Sets the parameters for the quiz manager so it can get started from scratch or from a recall after it needs to be restarted after rotation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean buildQuiz()
      Extracts the JSON quiz question objects and stores them in an array of quiz question objects.
      boolean checkAnswer(int answer)
      In quiz activity, when the user has made a selection, this checks the quiz question to see if the text at the array location matches the answer text.
      java.lang.String getAnswerOption(int num)
      Get the requested answer option and pass back to quiz activity so it can fill in the radio button
      java.lang.String getAnswerText()
      If the user decided to cheat, retrieve the answer text so the activity can show the user.
      int getCheatCount()
      Gets the cheat count and passes back to quiz activity so that quiz can pass it to score
      int getCorrectCount()
      Gets the number of correct guesses (regardless of cheating) so that the quiz activity can save the value and recall it when the activity gets recreated on rotation.
      java.lang.String getQuestion()
      Get the text for the question from the question object and pass back to activity so it can be displayed.
      int getQuestionNum()
      Get the question number and return it to the quiz activity when the activity is getting destoryed.
      java.lang.String getQuizName()
      Gets the quiz name and passes it back to quiz activity so that it can store it and recall it when we need to save the instance of the activity.
      boolean goToNextQuestion()
      Increment the question number and go to the next question
      void incrementCheatCount()
      Increments the cheat count if the user cheated for the answer and then selected the right answer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • QuizManager

        public QuizManager(android.content.Context context,
                   java.lang.String quizName,
                   int questionNum)
        Constructor for the Quiz Manager Sets the context from the calling activity, the quiz to access, and current question number
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the calling activity
        quizName - the name of the quiz file to extract
        questionNum - the question number because the activity might need to restart so it knows what question number it was on

      • QuizManager

        public QuizManager(android.content.Context context,
                   java.lang.String quizName,
                   int questionNum,
                   int correctCount,
                   int cheatCount)
        Constructor for the Quiz Manager Sets the parameters for the quiz manager so it can get started from scratch or from a recall after it needs to be restarted after rotation.
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the calling activity
        quizName - the name of the quiz to load from the json file
        questionNum - the question number the quiz is on
        correctCount - the number of correct questions
        cheatCount - the number questions the user cheated on

    • Method Detail

      • goToNextQuestion

        public boolean goToNextQuestion()
        Increment the question number and go to the next question
        Returns:
        true if there are more questions, false if there are no more questions

      • getQuestion

        public java.lang.String getQuestion()
        Get the text for the question from the question object and pass back to activity so it can be displayed.
        Returns:
        the text of the question

      • checkAnswer

        public boolean checkAnswer(int answer)
        In quiz activity, when the user has made a selection, this checks the quiz question to see if the text at the array location matches the answer text. update the correct count no matter what if they cheated or not, we deduct from score later helps avoid negative score numbers.
        Parameters:
        answer - the number selection from the radio buttons we use to get the correct text
        Returns:
        true if the answer was correct, false otherwise

      • incrementCheatCount

        public void incrementCheatCount()
        Increments the cheat count if the user cheated for the answer and then selected the right answer.

      • getCheatCount

        public int getCheatCount()
        Gets the cheat count and passes back to quiz activity so that quiz can pass it to score
        Returns:
        the number of times the user cheated and guessed right

      • getQuizName

        public java.lang.String getQuizName()
        Gets the quiz name and passes it back to quiz activity so that it can store it and recall it when we need to save the instance of the activity.
        Returns:
        string of the quiz name

      • getAnswerText

        public java.lang.String getAnswerText()
        If the user decided to cheat, retrieve the answer text so the activity can show the user.
        Returns:
        the text of the answer

      • getAnswerOption

        public java.lang.String getAnswerOption(int num)
        Get the requested answer option and pass back to quiz activity so it can fill in the radio button
        Parameters:
        num - the index of the array of answer options that we want the answer from
        Returns:
        the text of the specific answer option

      • getQuestionNum

        public int getQuestionNum()
        Get the question number and return it to the quiz activity when the activity is getting destoryed. Activity needs to save the question number so we can restart the quiz on rotation.
        Returns:
        current question number

      • getCorrectCount

        public int getCorrectCount()
        Gets the number of correct guesses (regardless of cheating) so that the quiz activity can save the value and recall it when the activity gets recreated on rotation.
        Returns:
        value of the number of questioned answered correctly

      • buildQuiz

        public boolean buildQuiz()
        Extracts the JSON quiz question objects and stores them in an array of quiz question objects.
        Returns:
        true if success, false otherwise
